page.title: 08C M School Sports
page.content: (Page provided by C M Primary School) We have a set of apparatus in the Infants playground and some hopscotches. Each class swims every day for 30 mins. Our swimming pool is heated but needs repairing. A committee has been set up to raise #2500 for repairs. Nearly #700 has been raised by pupils from sponsored swims, a disco and other activities. We have a football pitch which we also use for rounders. Today,Monday 8 July 1985 we have a Frenchman in our school trying to improve his English. His name is Pierre and he is very nice. He played rounders with us and although he had never played before he scored two rounders. Our school is divided into three Houses and each summer we have a sports day to find the top House.
